imdb.plot outline: From Local Filipino-Asian American community happenings, to sporting and red carpet events, the show provides viewers with "on-the-scene" exclusives. Our talented group of correspondents will take you on a trip to the most happening hot spots while keeping the Filipino-American community interest in mind.
imdb.title: On the Scene
